entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
